div.ab: Year 32, Tybi. Account from Phamounis. For the boat: light ropes, 5 obols; tow ropes, 1 drachma 2 obols; another tow rope forward, 3 obols; tallow, 2 obols; rushes, 3 obols; anchor, 3 drachmas; nails, 2 1/2 obols; oars and punt pole, 2 drachmas 3 obols. Payni. Rushes for caulking the boat, 2 drachmas 5 obols. Total, 13 drachmas.
